statement: As someone who has lived through many painful chapters of history, I believe university administrators must firmly protect students’ rights to protest while drawing a clear line against harassment, threats, and dehumanizing language toward any group. Administrators also need to be transparent in their decisions and consistent in their policies, so no side feels singled out or silenced. Above all, they should prioritize the safety and dignity of every student while encouraging empathy, critical thinking, and nonviolent engagement.

statement: I think campus administrators should let people protest about Israel and Gaza as long as it stays peaceful and doesn’t turn into bullying or threats against any group.
